ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is not difficult for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is well within the power of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: That surely is not difficult for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This would not cost God dear at all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And this not at all difficult for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that is not hard for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And this is not hard to Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: that is surely no great matter for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That is not a hard thing for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that is not difficult for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And with Allah that shall not be hard.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and that is not a hard thing for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor is that (at all) difficult for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that is not hard for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: this is not a great matter for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And that would not be difficult for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that is for Allah not difficult.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [35:17] And that is not an arduous thing for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That) i.e. destroying you and bringing a new creation (is not a hard thing for Allah.
